items.sentence: Tom heard his doorknob jiggling and was instantly alert.
Tom denied that he was the one who'd left the door open.

Tom always tries to set a good example for his children.

It was great to hear from Tom again after all this time.

What do high school girls talk about in school nowadays?
Tom's talents could be put to better use somewhere else.
Tom and I talked about Mary's boyfriend for a long time.
The best thing to do in a case like this is to be quiet.
Mr. Jackson has been teaching us French for three years.
When Mary's husband died, she felt like killing herself.

I'm afraid I won't be able to have lunch with you today.
